details:
verb
- to subject to psychoanalytic treatment
= example: to subject to psychoanalytic treatment
= synonyms: psychoanalyze, psychoanalyse
- to make a mathematical, chemical, or grammatical analysis of
= example: to make a mathematical, chemical, or grammatical analysis of
= synonyms: break down
- to consider in detail and subject to an analysis in order to discover essential features or meaning
= example: to consider in detail and subject to an analysis in order to discover essential features or meaning
= synonyms: study
- to break down into components or essential features
= example: to break down into components or essential features
